definition:
[**Definition**]{} Suppose $\{ E_\alpha\mid \alpha \in I \}$ is an
arbitrary collection of sets. These sets are said to be *pairwise
disjoint* if for every pair of distinct elements $\alpha,\beta\in I$, we
have $E_\alpha \cap E_\beta= \emptyset$.

### Remark {#remark .unnumbered}

The synonym *mutually disjoint* is also used.
